long_description_english: The beekeeping suit provides full-body protection against bee stings and is essential for beekeepers during hive inspections.
long_description_slovenian: Čebelarski kombinezon zagotavlja celovito zaščito pred čebeljimi vbodi in je nepogrešljiv pri pregledih panjev.

short_description_english: Protective veil to cover the head and face.
short_description_slovenian: Zaščitna mreža za prekrivanje glave in obraza.
long_description_english: The beekeeping veil offers protection for the head and face, ensuring beekeepers can work with bees safely.
long_description_slovenian: Čebelarska mreža nudi zaščito za glavo in obraz ter zagotavlja varno delo s čebelami.

short_description_slovenian: Zaščitne rokavice za ravnanje z čebelami.
long_description_english: Beekeeping gloves are designed to protect the hands and wrists from bee stings and are an essential part of a beekeeper's attire.
long_description_slovenian: Čebelarske rokavice so oblikovane za zaščito rok in zapestij pred čebeljimi vbodi ter so nepogrešljiv del čebelarjeve opreme.

long_description_english: Beekeeping boots provide protection for the feet and lower legs, ensuring beekeepers can work in the apiary with safety.
long_description_slovenian: Čebelarski škornji zagotavljajo zaščito za noge in spodnje dele nog, kar omogoča varno delo čebelarjev v čebelnjaku.

long_description_english: The beekeeping jacket provides upper body protection against bee stings and is comfortable for long hours in the apiary.
long_description_slovenian: Čebelarska jakna nudi zaščito zgornjega dela telesa pred čebeljimi vbodi in je udobna za dolge ure v čebelnjaku.

long_description_english: The beekeeping hat shields the head and face from bee stings, making beekeeping tasks safe and comfortable.
long_description_slovenian: Čebelarski klobuk ščiti glavo in obraz pred čebeljimi vbodi, kar omogoča varno in udobno opravljanje čebelarskih nalog.

long_description_english: The beekeeping smock offers upper body protection, allowing beekeepers to work confidently around beehives.
long_description_slovenian: Čebelarska tunika nudi zaščito zgornjega dela telesa in omogoča samozavestno delo okoli panjev.

short_description_english: Protective gaiters for the lower legs and ankles.
short_description_slovenian: Zaščitne naramnice za spodnje noge in gležnje.
long_description_english: Beekeeping gaiters provide protection for the lower legs and ankles, ensuring beekeepers are fully protected while working with bees.
long_description_slovenian: Čebelarske naramnice zagotavljajo zaščito spodnjih nog in gležnjev ter omogočajo popolno zaščito čebelarjev pri delu z čebelami.

short_description_english: Tool for calming and controlling bees during inspections.
short_description_slovenian: Orodje za pomirjanje in nadzor čebel med pregledi.
long_description_english: The beehive smoker is an essential tool for beekeepers, used to calm and control bees when working inside the hive.
long_description_slovenian: Dimilnik za panje je bistveno orodje za čebelarje, uporabljeno za pomirjanje in nadzor čebel med delom v panju.

short_description_english: Used to gently brush bees off frames and combs.
short_description_slovenian: Uporablja se za nežno krtačenje čebel s satov.
long_description_english: A bee brush is a gentle tool used to remove bees from frames and combs without harming them.
long_description_slovenian: Čebelja krtača je nežno orodje, uporabljeno za odstranjevanje čebel s satov brez škode.

short_description_english: Multi-purpose tool for opening hives and handling frames.
short_description_slovenian: Večnamensko orodje za odpiranje panjev in ravnanje s sati.
long_description_english: A hive tool is an indispensable multi-purpose instrument for beekeepers, used to open hives, pry frames, and perform various hive-related tasks.
long_description_slovenian: Orodje za panje je nepogrešljivo večnamensko orodje za čebelarje, uporabljeno za odpiranje panjev, odpiranje satov in izvajanje različnih nalog v panju.

short_description_english: Used to mark queen bees for easy identification.
short_description_slovenian: Uporablja se za označevanje matic za lažjo identifikacijo.
long_description_english: A queen bee marker is a handy tool for beekeepers to mark queen bees with different colors to facilitate easy identification and management.
long_description_slovenian: Označevalnik matic je uporabno orodje za čebelarje, s katerim označijo matice z različnimi barvami za lažjo identifikacijo in upravljanje.
